alert.note: Alert for Logan; Morgan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 15 at 3:27PM MDT until June 18 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River near Balzac affecting Washington, Morgan and Logan Counties. South Platte River near Kersey affecting Weld County. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Fort Morgan affecting Morgan County. South Platte River at Atwood affecting Logan County. South Platte River near Weldona affecting Weld and Morgan Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Platte River near Balzac. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The river is out of its banks and into fields and meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below 8.0 feet early Sunday morning. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
